customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this camera is horrible. Not user friendly and difficult to charge. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: David W. Perky

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 4K stabilization, upgrade from Hero 6.
customer_reviews.text: I skipped Hero 7 because I got Hero 6 right before the 7 came out. Anyways, HUGE upgrade in stabilization from my Hero 6, also audio is much better, this is the best GoPro in terms of stabilization. If you need gimbal performance without an actual gimbal I think this is the way to go plus it fits in my pocket so I take it everywhere and make videos anywhere I want. Low light performance is not that great, better than Hero 6 but I don't expect to use this for low light too much, it's really action camera for daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Max Lee

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I could barely use it. Tried 3 different SD cards (one brand new) and I randomly would get "SD card error" warnings, usually when trying to film above 1080p. The app connection is also terrible. It lags to begin with, but once you start recording there's a ~2 - 3 second lag. Extremely frustrating. Spent several hours trying to test/fix the issues and gave up. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pineapple

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality control
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality control!! One came with a crack on the lens glass and the replacement came with dead pixels on the screen. Even funnier, with identical settings, one beeps much louder than the other one, and the video recorded has slightly (but visible) different color tone when comparing one to the other. Not sure if that's what I expected from an almost $400 camera. Well, the image quality is descent as long as the battery is not dead, which is probably 15-20 mins when filming 2.7k@60 around 30 degrees (F) with wifi disabled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Larger than the hero 7 black; won’t fit in the GoPro super suit dive housing.

customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: I can't possibly put into words how much I hate this GoPro. I will never buy another piece of GoPro equipment ever... the device itself is so anti-intuitive. The features a terrible. The software is horrible. I've tried to shoot two tournaments for our baseball team and haven't captured any decent footage yet. Apparently the last tournament, one of the segments the GoPro shot was in "time-lapse" mode which means it's basically in fast foward and useless. I will never recommend a GoPro product to anyone ever! This is about the most frustrated I've been with a product ever. GARBAGE

customer_reviews.title: It’s useful if you don’t have much of an audience
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera specifically for live-streaming on Facebook live. I got it April of this year... almost 3 months and I’m fed up! It keeps crashing in the middle of a stream, I restart and miss content. One time it wouldn’t connect at all. I disconnected the app from the camera, deleted the app and reapplied, restarted my phone, got two updates for the app and disconnected the camera to factory settings and started over... and it still crashes. If GoPro is reading this, I want a full refund. All the videos I have watched about this camera, everyone raves about it.. I’m not impressed... and No, it’s not operator error!

customer_reviews.title: Full Featured Action Camera.
customer_reviews.text: Quite rugged, this small camera has lots of needed features. Also, lens and screen covers are needed but not supplied. One of the best features for me is the ability to pair the camera to my smartphone with the free app available from GoPro. The phone can remotely control all settings and functions, including start/stop recording, firmware updates, and shutting down the camera.

I do not need a second one right now, but I will not have any problem with getting one again. I am not sure about the battery life as I just film 3-5 minutes here and there during my outing and the battery held up good for me.

customer_reviews.title: Poor design. Broke within a week

It was not in need of a redesign, and they ended up making the simple design complicated and labor intensive. Whoever redesigned this new go pro has all the foresight and finesse of a disgruntled employee.
